title: I request riot looks into the battle bunny line of skins.
body:
Janna,
Karma,
Qiyana,
Riven,
Katarina,
Caitlyn,
Tristiana,
Poppy,
Kindred,
Evelyn,
and because i have a sense of humour.
{{champion:420}} 


Are all respected candidates for Battle Bunny status.

Upvote or i will visit your goblin lair.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DihMQ3P7fRk

replies.body:
Okay but like im still waiting for riot to make this a skin,

All the yes

How can you guys forget the absolutely most outrageous battle bunny?

https://pm1.narvii.com/5992/aa526f27eebbc04d5faace122ee9506bd129b186_hq.jpg

I object. This will not stand. At least half of those skins have to be for male champions, just for equality sake.

Besides, we all know {{champion:104}} would wear one of those with much more grace than {{champion:246}} .

> [{quoted}](name=Johnny El Rojo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lc2yrQkN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-01T21:14:11.193+0000)
>
> I object. This will not stand. At least half of those skins have to be for male champions, just for equality sake.
> 
> Besides, we all know {{champion:104}} would wear one of those with much more grace than {{champion:246}} .

He could but should he?
might as well give him a fireman skin and a address ladies are waiting.
Fireman graves would be epic as fuck I wouldn't mind hosing down some pool party caitlyns, with my giant double barrel water hose.
If your water hose is double barrel, then why conforming to point at only one pool party lady each time? {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

'lady' 

Boi hes pointing it at Braum ;)

> [{quoted}](name=LightswornLance,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lc2yrQkN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-01T23:05:23.518+0000)
>
> Fireman graves would be epic as fuck I wouldn't mind hosing down some pool party caitlyns, with my giant double barrel water hose.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
But... There's a pool party Graves.
But... There's a pool party Graves.

> [{quoted}](name=Johnny El Rojo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lc2yrQkN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-01T21:14:11.193+0000)

I can imagine Kayn wearing it something like that https://i.imgur.com/M450BWC.png, and when he transform the costume will be like https://ae01.alicdn.com/kf/HTB1xA26QbvpK1RjSZPiq6zmwXXa4/Men-s-Sexy-Bunny-Cosplay-Costumes-Rabbit-Uniform-Temptation-Nightclub-Role-Play-Rabbit-Men-Sexy-Costumes.jpg
Give me Battle Bunny {{champion:28}} and we'll talk.

Even more interesting to me than the skins themselves is the alt universe that they all exist in. Are EVERYONE battle bunnies? Is it just a bunny bunny world? Or are the battle kitties? And battle puppies? Battle birdies?
I propose that the Battle Bunny and Cats vs Dogs lines are in the same universe. All of it ruled over by the mighty God King Urf.

> [{quoted}](name=kayakninja,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lc2yrQkN,comment-id=00240002,timestamp=2019-11-06T14:05:37.480+0000)
>
> I propose that the Battle Bunny and Cats vs Dogs lines are in the same universe. All of it ruled over by the mighty God King Urf.

*scribbles in notebook*

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pls,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lc2yrQkN,comment-id=002400020000,timestamp=2019-11-08T23:40:58.361+0000)
>
> *scribbles in notebook*

Oh, if you want an enjoyable crazy skin idea, how about battle bunny {{champion:121}} , same universe as cats vs dogs rengar but like he hops on rengar bc reasons

No reason you can't have a badass bunny, did you watch watership down?

> [{quoted}](name=kayakninja,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lc2yrQkN,comment-id=00240002,timestamp=2019-11-06T14:05:37.480+0000)

oh my god. illaoi but the tentacles are cats paws sticking out of holes in boxxes or under the door trying to whap at things.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n_ZVTdn5XQ8 nice

...So Star Guardian Urgot COULD actually be a thing within the Star Guardian universe?

I'm scared and excited all at the same time now.
I imagine him in a cosplay world, like the master yi in the Annie-versary splash art where it's some cheaply made budget version of the actual theme.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pls,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lc2yrQkN,comment-id=0024,timestamp=2019-11-06T06:04:19.474+0000)

Dude if i was a lone adventurer with a team of battle bunnies.
"fill in kinky descriptions here"

Battle Bunny Akali
Battle Bunny Ahri
Battle Bunny Ezreal
Battle Bunny Kaisa
Battle Bunny Lux
And Jhin, Pyke, Yasuo and Vayne

Been waiting for Battle Bunny Talon for years. Rito pls. He's in Battle Bunny Riven's splash.
https://pm1.narvii.com/5894/0b67150e5216e73f7cb93bc9c099edc07bff69aa_hq.jpg

{{sticker:sg-lux}}

Also yes to Rek'Sai and Kalista!
Ah, I see you're a man of culture as well!
Battle Bunny Katarina {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Pretty sure that skinline doesn't fly under the current political climate. Maybe when everyone stops taking offense to everything...

You're aware Kai'sa was released? 

May I direct your attention to [Pool Party 2018](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/poolparty_t2_updated.jpg) as well? A teenage girl in a swimsuit and a woman in nothing but a bikini ... and a dapper hat.

Don't care about pc babies..
Battle Bunny Kat please
Only if we get Battle Bunny Gragas, Darius, Graves, Garen, Draven, Nautilus and Urgot as well
Sona or Soraka would be cute af

I'd kill for a battle bunny Kindred or Eve skin

We didn't get any easter themed skin since Cottontail Fizz in 2015 because of April Fools always taking the spot.. it's a shame
Wolf with Bunny Ears. GImme.
I want Battle Bunny Sylas, but only if there's a visible bulge

Battle Bunny Lux and Katarina would literally be so good to represent the Sexy bunny Lucy and Ezra outfits  in Fairy Tale and I’m down for that! Bring Fairy Tale to the Rift Rito!!! 

Also, Battle Bunny Illaoi op.
i would like at least one battle bunny dude.
